sentences.en: ...the midpoint between New York and Chicago.
sentences.cn: ...纽约与芝加哥之间的中点位置。

sentences.en: Above the knee, in the depression of the midpoint of the superior patellar border.
sentences.cn: 在膝上部, 髌底的中点上方凹陷处.

sentences.en: At the midpoint of the bridge she stopped.
sentences.cn: 在桥的中点处她停了下来.

sentences.en: Class midpoint and chronological average both are one of the most important concepts in statistics.
sentences.cn: 组中值与序时平均数是统计学中的两个重要概念.

sentences.en: Finding a balance and keeping it doesn't mean striking a midpoint.
sentences.cn: 找到平衡并保持,并不意味着要打在正中心的点上.

sentences.en: If a vibrating string is lightly touched at its midpoint , its pitch goes up an octave.
sentences.cn: 如果在一根振动弦的中部轻轻一触, 它就发出高八度的音.

sentences.en: MidPoint Circle Algorithm source code integrity, and can be used directly.
sentences.cn: 中点圆算法源代码的完整性, 并可以直接使用.

sentences.en: The centre mark is indicated at the midpoint of the halfway line.
sentences.cn: 中线的中间点标志为球场的中心点.

sentences.en: The century with 2000 as its midpoint marks three additional unique, important transitions in human history.
sentences.cn: 2000年前后50年, 人类历史另有三个独特而重要的转折.

sentences.en: The midpoint and equivalence point for carbonic acid are much higher.
sentences.cn: 碳酸滴定中点和等量点也高得多.

sentences.en: Then at midpoint of the century, partly because of a draining war, the bubble burst.
sentences.cn: 但到了世纪中叶, 部分由于耗资巨大的战争, 泡沫破裂了.

trans.tran_en: a point that is half of the way through or along something
